phrases: What unbelievable luck!
If that coffee had not spilled this morning...
How...
How is that possible?
You brat...
To think that you knew about Stray Cat, as well!
I guess it is futile.
So long as I do not undo Bites the Dust, it will keep automatically protecting you.
I-It is almost time!
The fact that you tried to kill me using Stray Cat's air bullets...
Hayato, you would not have come up with that idea
if you had not repeated this morning three, no, four times.
And the fact that you have returned for the fourth time...
It means that Bites the Dust's fate
is to blow up not only Rohan,
but another one of his friends, as well.
That means you must have told people other than Rohan about me.
No...
Perhaps you were just asked about me.
Who did you kill?
Hm?
Was there a shrimp named Koichi?
What about Jotaro Kujo?
I would be very happy if he were to die.
E-Everything's over...
Letting you return to this morning again is dangerous.
Because I will be attacked again.
Once the others die, I will undo Bites the Dust for a short while.
Bites the Dust is invincible!
Luck is on the side of Yoshikage Kira!
That name...
The name you said just now...
Oh, did I just say my real name?
Yes, my name is Yoshikage Kira.
I do not care if you tell that to anyone.
By the way, what time is it?
I did not tell anyone.
I never said a single word to anyone about you in the first place.
I only made a phone call.
He said that he overslept and was late,
so I found his number and woke him up.
I made a call from the house this morning.
That is all!
You are the one who said it.
You are the one who said it yourself!
I was just waiting.
I was just waiting for him to hurry up and get here without oversleeping!
Jojo's Bizarre Adventure
Diamond is Unbreakable
Episode 37 Shining D (Diamond) is Unbreakable, Part 1
Hey, Josuke.
We are going to be on time to meet up with everyone.
Hold it, Okuyasu!
I am not sure if it is coincidence or fate,
but this guy just said a name that I cannot believe I heard.
I-I-Impossible!
You said Yoshikage Kira just now, did not you?
Huh?
What?!
H-How could such a coincidence...
It is no coincidence!
It is not fate, either!
This was a gamble!
I made a gamble!
And he came!
I know I heard you say it!
You definitely just said that name!
It cannot be...
You bastard!
If you just coincidentally have the same name as him,
I can fix your wounds at any time.
H-He is Yoshikage Kira?
Th-That is impossible...
You brat!
H-How could this be?
I need to undo Bites the Dust and protect myself!
Return, Deadly Queen!
Cold...
The rain is going down my back.
Honestly, does no one show up on time?
Oh?
That is Koichi and Jotaro.
Yes!
I made it in time!
I won against fate!
I do not need any intense joy.
But I did not want any deep despair, either...
My goal was to live a peaceful life, like a plant.
You have shown yourself!
Now I will make sure your face does not look so peaceful.
I guess this picture that Rohan took was an instant jackpot.
Looks like it was not coincidence that we ran into him, Okuyasu.
I do not know the details,
but since he gave his real name to Hayato Kawajiri,
we may have gotten here just in the nick of time.
Just so you know, I was not running away from you.
If I wanted to kill you all, I could have done so at any time.
The reason I did not was just because I do not like fighting.
Strife is the exact opposite
of the peaceful life that I aim for, so I hate it.
It is easy to win one battle,
but then you accumulate stress for your next battle.
It is a foolish thing to do.
Fighting with others is a sad and endless process.
We were coming after you because you killed Shigechi, you dumbass!
A pig bastard like you whose hobby is to kill people
does not have the right to talk about what he wants to do, you dipshit!
Be careful, Josuke!
Do not touch that shitbag Deadly Queen's hand.
That is the only reason I did not dispose of you all.
You are the only three destroying my peace right now.
I have no choice but to fight the ones who find out my identity.
Hey, get behind us, Hayato Kawajiri.
Shining Diamond's range is 1-2 meters,
and it has the ability to fix anything that is been destroyed.
I will not need to use that ability against you!
I am just going to kick your ass!
Josuke!
Dora.
He is strong...
Yes!
I cannot see it, b-but that is amazing!
Kira just spit blood and went flying!
You are moving way too slow, Deadly Queen!
I guess yearning for a peaceful life has left you lacking in motivation.
Looks like your Stand is not cut out for one-on-one battles.
Josuke, do not let your guard down just because he is slow!
If it is best to fight him without touching him,
it would be better to use my Stand, The Hand.
Bring it!
Scraping away space to teleport, eh?
I attacked Josuke, but now the direction of my attack has turned...
Toward you.
I-Inside my backpack...
What?!
Though I guess it worked out.
It still hit right on the dot, despite being the first time I have used it.
I-I was not touched...
I-I was not even touched...
The air...
The air breathed fire!
Okuyasu!
Th-The air... breathed fire?
The air...
The reason I kept that thing around was for this.
I can use Stray Cat's ability to control the air for Deadly Queen's explosions.
Hayato,
You brought it for me!
Invisible air and an unstoppable explosion!
Could any two things in this world be more compatible than that?
He was keeping it just for this purpose...
And I am the one who brought it here!
I said that it appears luck is on my side, did not I?
In Japanese, fate is written with characters meaning luck that brings life.
How fitting.
The
The Ha
The Han
The Hand
Oku
Okuyasu
Okuyasu Niji
Okuyasu Nijimura
Is something wrong, Jotaro?
No, it is nothing.
I just thought the rain sounded like Josuke's voice.
I am sure he overslept.
If he does not show up in the next five minutes,
I am going to head to Hayato Kawajiri's school without them.
I will fix you right now, Okuyasu!
That is not going to happen.
Because I am going to blow you away first.
It launched air like a bullet!
And he turned that air into a bomb!
It is coming!
You have got to run away!
You cannot see it?
It is that area that looks distorted!
I-It is going to hit!
Fix?
He is trying to use that ability to fix Okuyasu...
The ability to fix things...
To think it is so fast that you were able to create a wall from the broken slate.
I-It is shooting again!
I-It is coming!
Presumptions are more terrifying than anything else.
Especially when you are under the impression that
your strengths or abilities are impressive.
I-It is starting to come through!
Even though it came in contact with it, it did not explode!
Hmph.
I thought it might blow his head off,
but it appears that the explosion was a bit shallow.
Deadly Queen's explosions are not limited only to things it touches.
That would be a presumption.
It can explode at any given distance.
No matter where you might hide,
or how fast you might try to guard yourself with a wall or metal plate,
it can go right through and explode freely!
You cannot run anymore.
Die!
It is no use!
There is no way to dodge it!
I cannot run?
I have no intention of running away...
And I have not from the beginning.
Then I would not be able to fix Okuyasu!
He is heading toward it?!
I-It went through!
You can make it explode at any distance?
Looks like there is an exception to that.
If I happen to explode when I am close to you, Kira,
you are not going to be safe, are you?!
All right, Okuyasu.
Now I can fix you.
Do not touch him!
I think... he might have just used Okuyasu's body and...
Damn that Hayato...
Impossible...
I did not see Deadly Queen touch Okuyasu.
How can you tell, Hayato Kawajiri?!
You are not a Stand user!
I can tell!
I have lived in the same house as him until this morning!
I can tell by his expressions!
It touched him without us noticing!
There is no doubt!
Okuyasu's body's been turned into a bomb!
Yoshikage Kira!
I am not sure...
Since you were charging toward me,
I am not sure if I was actually able to touch Okuyasu or not.
It all happened so fast.
Should I just try pushing the button?
D-Do not, Yoshikage Kira!
Hurry up and shoot the next air bullet!
Shoot it at me, damn it!
There is really no need to rush into attacking you right now.
Josuke Higashikata, I lose nothing by deciding whether to attack or not
based on your movements.
There is a chance that Okuyasu was not turned into a bomb.
You might be able to fix him with Shining Diamond.
This might be too forward of me,
but there is only one way to save Okuyasu's life in this situation...
And that is for you to touch him and fix him.
Even if I turned him into a bomb, if you touch him using Shining Diamond,
you might die from the explosion, but Okuyasu will not.
If you were to sacrifice yourself,
you would at least be able to fix your best friend's wounds, would not you?
D-Do not touch him!
I will wait until you make your decision.
You can decide whether you are going to touch your best friend and fix him,
or come after me.
I will wait as long as it takes for you to make your decision,
but I guess there is no way you will touch him,
even if he is your precious best friend...
I have proof that you should not touch him!
I am sure he cannot control more than one bomb at a time!
Once he is used his explosive ability,
he cannot create the next bomb until the first one has gone off.
As proof, he could be shooting off tons of bombs,
but he is only shot off one at a time!
He changed Okuyasu into a bomb, so he cannot shoot now!
What are you trying to say?
I am telling you that there is a way to save Okuyasu-san!
And for that...
Deadly Queen, switch on the bomb.
I just need to touch him!
What?!
H-Hayato, you...
All right!
Shining Diamond!
You are insane, Hayato Kawajiri...
You have got some guts.
Are you really a grade-schooler, kid?
If I was not expecting you to use your ability to f-fix things, I could not do it.
Besides, you cannot die.
If you die, he can easily kill me, and then he will be free.
He will eventually kill my mom, too...
and other people in this town again!
No, you will die.
To think that your ability to fix things
is so powerful that it can fix what I have blown up instantaneously...
I have just been reminded that it is the most troublesome ability to have against me.
Deadly Queen!
Josuke, he is firing!
I will detonate it upon impact so you cannot put your guard up.
However, since there is a chance you will dodge it if it detonates on impact,
I shot a small one so it would be hard to see.
I wonder if you can dodge it while
holding Okuyasu, and with debris from the explosion stuck in your wounds...
Hurry up and run, Josuke!
If the explosion so much as grazes you next time, it will be fatal!
Okuyasu!
I fixed your wounds.
Wake up, Okuyasu!
Hurry and move!
He is going to get you!
Eight meters until impact.
Come on, you can wake up now!
You are totally fine now, Okuyasu!
Josuke!
Just seven more meters.
Just open your eyes, Okuyasu!
Hey!
Hey, Okuyasu!
Hurry up and open your damn eyes!
Hey!
Let us work together like we always do and kick his ass!
Josuke...
I am going to place that bomb right under his nose,
as precise as one of Joe Montana's touchdown passes,
and then detonate it from there.
Four meters until impact.
L-Let go!
If you do not run, you will be hit head-on!
Okuyasu is...
Okuyasu is already...
Shut up!
You need to hurry up and run away yourself, kid!
Two more meters until impact.
The explosion will cover approximately a three-meter radius.
I see it!
It is about two meters in front of you!
Hurry up and run away!
Okuyasu...
Okuyasu is already dead!
He is not dead!
Okuyasu is fixed!
He is going to open his eyes!
I will get it one meter closer and then push the button.
Josuke!
Splash
Th-The air bullet was split by a knife of blood!
Did the blood flowing through Josuke
just fly out with immense power and cut it like a knife?
That is it!
Just like when I stabbed it with
the needle from the compass in the attic,
the air from the cat weed shrank!
He used the blood from his wound like a water pressure cutter
to cut through it...
But I wonder about the air bullet.
It did not shrink!
It is heading toward you!
An air bullet that is become a bomb is
kept stable by Deadly Queen's abilities.
That is why it will not shrivel!
No matter if you try to crush it or cut it into pieces,
the bomb ability will not go away!
It will detonate as soon as you touch it.
All right, impact.
Huh?
H-His body...
is floating?
Detonate!
No, it is not floating...
I cannot fix my own wounds with Shining Diamond's abilities,
but if it is debris from the road
that got into my wound in the first explosion...
I can fix that!
Th-The piece of the road that was in his wound pulled his body!
I do not have a choice.
It is someone else's house, but we are going to run in here, Hayato.
P-Please leave Okuyasu behind.
If you are holding Okuyasu, you will be killed!
He will catch up and he will get you!
Would you just shut up, Hayato?
Okuyasu and I get along great.
He is my friend!
That is not what I am talking about!
When you fixed Okuyasu's wounds, he was already dea
Stop!
Do not.
Do not you dare say any more.
Think about defeating him!
I do not like it...
If he did not have that ability to fix things,
my bombs would be invincible.
The most terrifying thing getting in the way of my peace of mind is not Jotaro.
It is him!
Josuke Higashikata!
Episode 38 Shining D (Diamond) is Unbreakable, Part 2
Episode 38 Shining D (Diamond) is Un breakable, Part 2
